CSS
format:
<style>
    .button-scadalock-label {
        font-size: 32px;
    }
    
    .table-scadastatus {
        background-color: #2274a5;
        text-align: center;
        border: 1px solid;
        width: 100%;
    }
    #table-scadastatus-title {
        font-size: 18px;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: white;
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 50px;
    }
    #table-scadastatus-status {
        font-size: 32px;
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 168px;
    }

    .table-scadaparams {
        background-color: #2274a5;
        text-align: center;
        border: 1px solid;
        width: 100%;
    }
    #table-scadaparams-title {
        font-size: 18px;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: white;
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 50px;
    }
    .table-scadaparams-body {
        font-size: 18px;
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 40px;
    }
    .table-scadaparams-tags {
        text-align: left;
        border: 1px solid;
        width: 60%;
    }
    .table-scadaparams-params {
        text-align: center;
        border: 1px solid;
        width: 40%;
    }

    .table-scadacount {
        background-color: #2274a5;
        text-align: center;
        border: 1px solid;
        width: 100%;
    }
    #table-scadacount-title {
        font-size: 18px;
        font-weight: bold;
        color: white;
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 36px;
    }
    .table-scadacount-neck {
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 36px;
    }
    .table-scadacount-count {
        font-size: 32px;
        border: 1px solid;
        height: 48px;
    }
    #table-scadacount-good {
        width: 50%;
    }
    #table-scadacount-notgood {
        width: 50%;
    }

    .display-costprice {
        font-size: 32px;
        background-color: #2274a5;
    }
</style>
